<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Remaining Password Reset CooldownActive"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/auth/password/reset/cooldown"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the remaining time in seconds until you can send another password reset request.

You can find more information about a password reset [here](../../docs/guides/auth/authentication#password-reset).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"email","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The remaining cooldown.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"remaining":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"required":["remaining"],"title":"MailCooldownResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"The following error codes correspond to this status:\n* **`CACHE_OPERATION_FAILURE`:** Represents an exception that occurs during cache operation failures.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"code":{"type":"string"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
